Name: Blooming Wind
Desc: Used to upgrade the Gilded Blossom W-Engine
Desc2: A special W-Engine component obtained in Hollow C41. It can be used to upgrade the W-Engine, Gilded Blossom, increasing its Ether resonance. A seed that can cause the gilded golden flowers to bloom, etched with the radiance of a season that slips by like sand through your fingers.
